name: Reflection: Heaven or Hell?
description:
Controls:

Once a person makes it to the podium you can click on them and drag the papers that appear to the left of your table and their death certificate will appear.

Look over the death certificate and using the ten commandments to the right of you as a guide, decide if that person goes to heaven or hell.

Once you've decided where they are going, you can click on that person and physically fling them around with the mouse and send them to the left for Hell and the Right for Heaven. If you get them all right then you win, but if you get one wrong then you must start over.
